sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Segment,Comment,Icon,Label, Feed} from 'semantic-ui-react' class NewsFeeds extends React.Component{ handleLikeClicked = event =>{ event.preventDefault(); this.setState({like: !this.state.like }) } state ={ like: false } render(){ const {like} = this.state; var i = [1,2] return( {/* LamSonhai 1:00pm */} Elliot Fu added you as a friend 1 Hour Ago 4 Likes ) } } export default NewsFeeds
